titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning Lent in two parts : the first an historical account of its observation, the second an essay concern[ing] its original : this subdivided into two repartitions whereof the first is preparatory and shews that most of our Christian ordinances are deriv'd from the Jews, and the second conjectures that Lent is of the same original.
titleStmt.author: Hooper, George, 1640-1727.

titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning Lent in two parts : the first an historical account of its observation, the second an essay concern[ing] its original : this subdivided into two repartitions whereof the first is preparatory and shews that most of our Christian ordinances are deriv'd from the Jews, and the second conjectures that Lent is of the same original.
titleStmt.author: Hooper, George, 1640-1727.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Warren for Walter Kettilby,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Diagram torn. Pages 300-31 from Bodleian Library copy spliced at end.
